mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT book. CODE AS "Code", bookmessage.bookID AS "bookId", bookmessage. NAME AS "name", bookmessage.jiaofu AS "JiaoFu", bookmessage.kind AS "Kind", bookmessage.author AS "author", bookmessage.publisher AS "publisher", bookmessage.introduction AS "introduction" FROM book LEFT JOIN bookmessage ON book.BookID = bookmessage.BookID WHERE CONCAT( IFNULL(bookmessage.`name`, ''), IFNULL(bookmessage.kind, ''), IFNULL(bookmessage.author, ''), ifnull(bookmessage.publisher,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{0},'%') GROUP BY book.BookID
SELECT * FROM bookmessage WHERE BookID IN (SELECT DISTINCT BookID FROM book ORDER BY putawayTime DESC ) limit 10
select name , author,publisher,reason from recommendBook left join bookmessage on recommendBook.bookId = bookmessage.BookID where isUse = true
select * from book left join bookmessage b on book.BookID = b.BookID and code = #{code} limit 1
select code from book where state = 0 and BookID = 1 limit 1
